long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage bookmarks for Workday. Includes start/stop proxy and login links. Appears as a side panel in Chrome for easy access.

Includes "Star Paste." Use star paste to fill in search fields from a list of values in your clipboard.  Enter an asterisk (*) in any search field.  Every click will pull in the next value in the list from your clipboard.  Great for updating security lists and adding values to report filters.
